pre_caption: The video begins with a medium shot of a white door positioned in the center of the frame in the middle ground, flanked by a brown curtain in the left foreground and a dark shelf in the right middle ground. If **shot size or spatial position** changes, describe how these transitions occur clearly, specifying both the **initial and final states**.

In addition, the human-written captions below already describe the subjects (if any) and the scenery in this video but do not capture their spatial composition and movements. Use these captions as a reference, but do not rely on them completely. Your goal is to fully capture the spatial framing and movements in this video.
